full_title: Pour Me A Drink by Post Malone (Ft. Blake Shelton)
title: Pour Me A Drink
title_with_featured: Pour Me A Drink (Ft. Blake Shelton)

description.plain:
“Pour Me A Drink” marks the first collaboration between Post Malone and Blake Shelton. First teased on May 24th, the track officially released on all streaming platforms on June 21st. The single is also expected to be included on Post Malone’s new album F-1 Trillion as the fourth track, which is set to release on August 16th.

Post Malone and Blake Shelton celebrate the simple things in life over a carefree country-pop instrumental that is very characteristic for Shelton. The pair commemorate kicking back and cracking open a cold one on Friday after a hard week’s work.

This is not the first time Post Malone has collaborated with a country artist. He also crossed paths with Morgan Wallen to record I Had Some Help and covered Joe Diffie’s Pickup Man earlier this year, leading many to believe his next album will be heavily country influenced, which is not the style of music he is typically known for creating.
